description: Tottenham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Tottenham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Tottenham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Tottenham in before the big kick-off on Sunday, 13 August?
If you send us your questions, we will ask our BBC Radio London experts for their thoughts on all things Spurs.
